PPLoc: Privacy Policy hosted on intranet and accessible to employees.
activities:
DreamWorks Animation SKG Inc. will use EU Employee Data to perform one or more of the identified activities in relation to one of more of the identified processes.

Activities
- Administer
- Analyze
- Comply
- Communicate
- Delete
- Enforce
- Maintain
- Plan
- Process
- Provide
- Remove
- Report
- Store
- Support
- Transmit

Processes
- Business Continuity
- Compensation (Benefits, Bonus, Stock Plan)
- Governance (Policies, Standards and Procedures)
- Contract Management
- Data and Systems Protection
- Disaster Recovery
- Employment Lifecycle Management (Candidate Identification, Recruitment, Performance Assessment, Employee Assistance, Coaching and Development, Disciplinary Activities and Succession Planning)
- Environmental Health and Safety
- Finance and Accounting
- Leave Management (Sabbaticals, vacation and other forms of leave)
- Payroll Processing
- Personnel Administration
- Policy Enforcement
- Privacy
- Provisioning of accounts across hardware, software and services
- Service Request Fulfillment
- Training
- Threat and Vulnerability Management as related to Data, Systems and Services. 
- Travel and Expense Tracking and Reimbursement
- Workflow Enablement

To facilitate the identified Activities and Process, personnel within departments such as Information Security, Human Resources, Technology, Business and Legal Affairs, Internal Audit, Operations and company directors, managers, supervisors and other company management are required to access, store, process and transmit EU Employee Data in a manner commensurate with their job role, responsibilities and duties. 
DreamWorks Animation SKG Inc. takes appropriate steps to ensure that such personnel are bound by duties of confidentiality with respect to EU Employee Data.

Third party services may be contracted for the provision of services, systems and support for the processing and storage of EU Employee Data. DreamWorks Animation SKG Inc. takes appropriate steps to ensure the necessary safeguards are in place when using third party service providers.
corpofftitle1: Head of Technology Law and Litigation

personaldata: The covered data includes electronically and manually processed organizational and human resources data.
